1.name: text
1.value: So let's say you became Oonald Mump ,because you do become Oonald Mump and you want to build a wall because why not?Anyway let introduce you to Oonald Mump

2.name: text
2.value: Oonald Mump is competing for 69th president of the U.S.A. and has always dreamed of building a wall for the U.S.A. and that is your goal except you don't have the materials needed nor the money for it either so you plan on taking land and possibly selling it (and take all the material)

3.name: text
3.value: Well first you have to defeat "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" then you have to defeat "Crazy Bernie" and after that you have to defeat "Crooked Hillary" and finally you have to defeat Obama and then you can continue trying to build a wall.So let's get started!

4.name: text
4.value: So first you see "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" and start to battle

4.name: options
4.value:
We go boom, Scoopnum [5]
Trial [6]
No you [7]
Stab'em! [8]

5.name: text
5.value: you exploded yourself and "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" and died, restart?

6.name: text
6.value: You put "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" on trial but failed and "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" used whack x10000000 and you died restart?

7.name: text
7.value: "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" uses whack x1000000 but you used "no you " and win ; congrats you defeated "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" and have 5 more brain-cells and now you have 5 brain-cells

8.name: text
8.value: You tried to stab "Sleepy Joe Bidden 30330" with a rubber sword and it was super effective but he hung on and used whoaaaaaaa-squash and squashed you until he can't no more and you became Flat Stanley and died ,restart?

9.name: text
9.value: Now you must defeat "Crazy Bernie"!2 Days later you see "Crazy Bernie" walking around the local park and singing "Burn Baby Burn" and you have a few traps that might work which one do you choose?

9.name: options
9.value:
Set up a TNT trap so if he steps on a string then he will blow up. [10]
You go to his house and set up a trap so when he opens the door a big rock falls on his head. [11]
You snipe him with a sniper from far away. [12]

10.name: text
10.value: So you taunt "Crazy Bernie" to go to the string and it explodes him and luckily you were 10 meters away and it didn't hurt you.Congratulations you earn 3 brain-cells now you have 8 brain-cells!

11.name: text
11.value: So you went to "Crazy Bernie's" house and put a big rock on the door but his wife saw you and snapped so you ended up in the underworld.You died ,restart?

12.name: text
12.value: You went to a very far and tall building and held the sniper.Sadly you didn't have enough brain-cells to know how to shoot a gun so you shot it backwards and died ,restart?

13.name: text
13.value: So it is now night time and it's time to sleep boi!You got two options,

13.name: options
13.value:
your house [14]
luxury hotel which one well you sleep in [15]

15.name: text
15.value: You went to your kitchen and ate some buttered toast and set of to your adventure again but you saw on television that "Crooked Hillary" was 5 states beside where Oonald is so you set up your journey and go on plane to Michigan.

16.name: text
16.value: On your the plane that your on you get to choose what food you want

16.name: options
16.value:
pasta with meatballs and rhubarb [17]
pasta with Swedish meatballs [18]

17.name: text
17.value: You ate your spaghetti in peace except a minute later you died because the rhubarb you ate still had leaves on and you died by a seizure ,restart?

18.name: text
18.value: You ate your Swedish meatballs in peace and when you finished you were full and content and waited for another 5 hours and dinner started serving but you choose what food you want to eat.

18.name: options
18.value:
Fried rice made with castor oil [19]
Burger with buns made out of cassava flour [19]
hot dogs with 2 avocado seeds and some tree bark. [19]
